SELECT /*[InboundDao.xml][sele BIZ_CD , IB_NO , DC_CD , CLIENT_CD , IB_GBN_CD , IB_PROG_ST_CD , IB_PLAN_YMD , IB_YMD , PO_NO , PO_YMD , SUPPLIER_CD , CAR_NO , TC_OB_NO , USER_COL1 , USER_COL2 , USER_COL3 , USER_COL4 , USER_COL5 , REMARK , USE_YNctInboundList] 입고관리의 입고전표 데이터들을 조회 */
FROM tb_ib_m WHERE 1=1
AND IB_NO LIKE '%'#{ibNo}'%'
AND IB_PLAN_YMD = #{ibPlanYmd}

SELECT /*[InboundDao.xml][selectInboundDetailList] 입고관리의 입고전표상세 데이터들을 조회 */ BIZ_CD , IB_NO , IB_DETAIL_SEQ , PO_DETAIL_SEQ , IB_PROG_ST_CD , ITEM_CD , ITEM_NM , ITEM_ST_CD , PO_UOM_CD , PO_QTY , PLAN_QTY , CONF_QTY , APPR_QTY , EXAM_QTY , INST_QTY , PUTW_QTY , NO_IB_RSN_CD , IB_COST , IB_VAT , IB_AMT , MAKE_LOT , MAKE_YMD , DIST_EXPIRY_YMD , LOT_ID , LOT_ATTR1 , LOT_ATTR2 , LOT_ATTR3 , LOT_ATTR4 , LOT_ATTR5 , TC_OB_DETAIL_SEQ , USER_COL1 , USER_COL2 , USER_COL3 , USER_COL4 , USER_COL5 , APPR_DT , APPR_USER_ID , REMARK , USE_YN FROM tb_ib_d WHERE 1=1 AND IB_NO = #{IB_NO}
SELECT /*[InboundPlanDao.xml][selectDcCmbList] 입고관리의 물류창고 데이터들을 조회 */ BIZ_CD , DC_CD AS code , DC_NM AS name FROM tb_ms_dc WHERE 1=1
SELECT /*[InboundPlanDao.xml][selectClientCmbList] 입고관리의 고객사 데이터들을 조회 */ BIZ_CD , CLIENT_CD AS code , CLIENT_NM AS name FROM tb_ms_client WHERE 1=1
